subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Sprinters have several chances to win early stages of the Giro d’Italia but once the race hits the mountains, many of them pack up and leave.
snippet: Sprinters have several chances to win early stages of the Giro d’Italia but once the race hits the mountains, many of them pack up and leave.
